title: Brick Breaker
description: Break all the bricks to advance to the next level!
short_description: Break bricks with a bouncing ball

instructions.desktop: Use Left/Right arrow keys to move the paddle. Press Space to launch or pause.
instructions.mobile: Touch and drag to move the paddle horizontally.

how_to_play.title: How to Play
items: Move the paddle to bounce the ball
Break all bricks to clear the level
Don't let the ball fall past the paddle

tips.title: Pro Tips
items: Aim for the edges of bricks for better angles
Keep the ball in the middle of the paddle
Move quickly to catch the ball

celebration.title: Level {{level}} Complete!
celebration.subtitle: Get ready for the next challenge
